ValidationRule.description: Based on the data in these fields RCS Customers who are included on termination file upload must be prevented from having new PO requests processed
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Account.Preferred_Payment_type__c, "Credit/Debit Card"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Payment_Status__c,"Terminated"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Termination_Reason__c, "Non Payment; Sent to Collections"), Account.OwnerId = '0050V000006kiTY', RecordType.Name ="RCS PO", ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c , "RCS PO") ), AND( !ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Account.Preferred_Payment_type__c, "Credit/Debit Card"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Payment_Status__c,"Terminated"), ISPICKVAL(Account.Termination_Reason__c, "Non Payment; Sent to Collections"), Account.OwnerId = '0050V000006kiTY', RecordType.Name ="RCS PO", ISPICKVAL( Case_Sub_Type__c , "RCS PO"), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'PO On-Hold CFS') ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account AR is delinquent, no additional orders may be processed until issue resolved
